website_summaries.verdict: While the audio AR features are still in the works, the Bose Frames managed to produce decent enough audio to make them a compelling wearable audio device that can take the place of headphones.
pros: The Bose Frames deliver surprisingly decent sound using embedded micro speakers
While the arms are slightly bulky, the sunglasses don't feel heavy on your head and are comfortable to wear
Using the sunglasses to make calls works well
Even though the audio sounds loud to you, people won't hear it unless they're standing right next to you
cons: There's no prescription lens option available from Bose, and adding a third-party prescription lens voids the warranty

customer_reviews.title: Don't work with Spotify
customer_reviews.text: Like the frames, sound. Everything good until I realized they only work with iMusic, not with Spotify. Not changing over. Returning frames. Let me know when they work with Spotify.
customer_reviews.author: K. Berman

customer_reviews.title: CRAPPY UNIT. CRAPPY SUPPORT. CRAPPY PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED **** it’s DEAD now and does not charge. Hard to contact support, only via phone and not helpful. I mentioned i have prescription lenses it and they said it voids the warranty. After spending thousands of dollars in other bose products Its going to the garbage after 3 months and will never buy anything BOSE again.
customer_reviews.author: AYLTON SOUZA

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend these sun glasses
customer_reviews.text: The volume is too low, even at it’s highest level. The battery life is too short and the method for turning them off is to hold them up-side-down which is a non starter if you have the glasses on a neck dongle.
customer_reviews.author: Fast Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Holding ultimate judgement until later - initial thoughts...
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was good - easy to open and sturdy. Case is nice and functional. pulled out the frames - initial thought was damn - these things are gas station cheap! really the frames appear and feel real cheap. for $200 I would expect RayBan material. They look like RayBan wayfarers on steroids big eyes kinda not my style, but I got these for golfing and the Golfshot App and its AR capabilities - will try this feature out soon.
customer_reviews.author: spikehed

customer_reviews.title: Blown away!
customer_reviews.text: This works really well! It is my first frame/headset. It is a bit large, but sound is awesomely clear. I was walking in the wind and received a call. i was able to talk and be heard clearly without covering the wind... normally what i would do on the cellphone.
customer_reviews.author: Borabora

customer_reviews.title: Only had this 1 week but superb
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, lightweight; I use it on my train commute and it's perfect, no leakage, nothing on or over my ears, you can hear everything around at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pimsler

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound!
customer_reviews.text: These audio glasses far exceeded my expectations, even by Bose standards. I don't know how they packed such incredible sound in such a small space, but the sound and range are better than I could have hoped for!
customer_reviews.author: Y. C. Turner

customer_reviews.title: They recycle nicer shades at the IMAX
customer_reviews.text: Can’t speak to sound quality because after seeing how these look, I didn’t bother to try. There might be $200-worth of Bose impregnated in these cheap looking 50s-Rocker-Halloween-costume-quality shades, but I’ll never know. Embarrassingly fugly contraption.
customer_reviews.author: mike d

customer_reviews.title: Clear sound. Nice fit. Aware of surroundings
customer_reviews.text: I love the ability to wear my book and out music. I can work out and don’t have to worry about headphones sliding out of my ears. Sound is great! Clear and crisp. Next time I’m driving and listening to my music, I won’t get stopped by the police for wearing headphone. I was told they are too big for my face, but I like big dark shades. I liked them enough to purchase a pair for my son. I will turn the lenses into glasses so I can read, but otherwise, what an excellent choice. If I had to make a wish, a colour other than black. Too severe for me. A brown turtle shell would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: PointTeacher

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight and amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: Love the shades! I wish the battery life was more than 3.5 hours but they are awesome
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy it
customer_reviews.text: it works but not spectacular. In noisy places, u will hear almost nothing. The frame material feels cheap. The lenses feel cheap too. Definitely not Bose level luxury. sound quality is only so so. bluetooth connection drops a fair bit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These look ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even get to the point of trying out the audio features because I knew as soon as I put them on that I would not be keeping these glasses. The frames and glass feels of cheap material and look like cheap Halloween costume glasses. They are big and ridiculous looking. I would have expected that a premium audio company like Bose would have paired up with a premium sunglass company like Ray-Ban to come up with a premium product worthy of the $200 price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Jeromy

customer_reviews.title: These are cool.  Very cool.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and you can still hear what's going on around you. The lenses are good and since they are interchangable, I think you could get prescription lenses made. I ordered a second set of lenses polarized for boating. Easy set up and works flawless so far.
customer_reviews.author: Southshore Guy

customer_reviews.title: New smaller size is deal sealer for female audience
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my wife who had been looking at these glasses for quite some time. This was the particular model that she really wanted, but until recently it only existed in the larger frame, which was a bit too large for her slim face. What closed the deal was the offering in the new smaller size for this particular design. She loved it and is quite happy with the sound quality and overall operation of the device.
customer_reviews.author: Skipper

customer_reviews.title: Surprising sound quality in sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: If you come with expectations that these are sunglasses and not earbuds, you’ll be very pleased. The style is a little clunky but I’m loving the sound and call quality. There’s not much bleed out into the general world. An unexpected use for me is on my motorcycle. Anything under 75mph and the sound is like having a radio in a convertible. Lens quality is very good to excellent. I got the blue replacement lenses and am loving those. Be warned that Large is legit. I have a big head and still feel like I might have gotten the S/M. I am happy with them and would buy them again if lost or broken. Really enjoying them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dezso

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I am blown away by the overall quality of these. Crystal clear sound, the way the controls work feels so futuristic and high tech, so comfortable to wear, and they look great
customer_reviews.author: Ethon O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: Sounded great in the store. Sounded great the first 10 mins of use, the audio quality dropped and the severe audio stutter starts and the only way to get rid of it is to forget the BT connection in the phone and re-pair. I am a die hard Boss customer - but this feels like a product that made it too soon to the market - needs software polish (hopefully because if the problem is actually the hardware then... well back to regular headphones.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hernandez Schafhauser

customer_reviews.title: Sadly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I knew not to expect any bass or full sound but this is not the bose sound experience I would expect I was not happy with the sound quality at all . I hope they revise this item and work on the sound quality as well as battery life . sadly I am returning this product
customer_reviews.author: Orli

customer_reviews.title: Great frames and sound!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Bose glasses. I have been able to increase productivity and enjoy a more hands-free life (sadly, I lost both my hands in a fly-fishing accident 17 years ago). When I’m grocery shopping I can listen to an audiobook or music and when I go for my nightly constitutional I like to talk to my kids. I know it looks like I’m talking to myself but that’s a benefit because it also helps people give me a wide berth. Maybe Amazon will have theirs fixed by the time I need new glasses and maybe I might look at theirs again.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Dean Rice

customer_reviews.title: Stylish sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on release day and took them on vacation a few days later, I think Bose should send me the next pair free as I think I might have got them a lot of sales. They sound great especially if you cup you hands over your ears when listening. It's a fantastic product with the great Bose sound. I look forward to all new Bose products but these sunglasses are perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap quality frame
customer_reviews.text: I haven't listen for music. Lenses are good but upon holding and looking for the frame it's way below my expectation.
customer_reviews.author: jms

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: 2nd set battery kaput
customer_reviews.text: Updated review - this is the SECOND pair and the first one, battery was dead and not revivable after one month. Second pair (which they sent as a replacement) mid-January and by end of May, battery again will not charge. While I love these for many reasons, this is very frustrating. Original review: I was skeptical but I really love these. The sound quality and volume even when walking alongside a road with traffic is decent enough to still hear my podcast. I still don’t know what others hear if I’m on a bus but will find out. Hope they can’t be heard and not too distracting to others.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Wiesman

customer_reviews.title: Easily Broken
customer_reviews.text: Removed them from my face and they snagged on my winter cap and the arm bent nearly broke off. Waiting for the Echo Glasses now.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Blow your coworkers mind!
customer_reviews.text: Ok first off I blow people's mind when I have these on and I let them give it a go. It's a great product for someone that listens to music podcast or just wants to have sunglasses on. They look heavy and actually aren't. The sound is Bose quality clear but not super loud and that is ok. I like that I can listen to my music and have a conversation with someone.. no product allows you to do that unless you are one of those people with one ear pod on..lol charging its fairly quick. I can use spotify, YouTube, and thing on my phone with bluetooth over no issues here. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Mario gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: polished audio quality
customer_reviews.text: I tried these out in a brick&mortar store and was amazed at the sound quality. I tried to save some cash with a bone-conductance alternative that turns out to be total junk. Ultimately the Bose are the best for my cycling commute to work. They have great design features like flip upside down to shut down, and power&connect quickly with one button. It's so nice to throw them on and ride rather than wrestling with buds/wires. The only cons are 1. lack of volume control. 2. slip down my nose (first sunglasses to ever do this on my average size nose).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $200
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and cute. Ideal for a commuters who wants to be aware of their surroundings. I feel like Bose missed a few good opportunities here like for instance there is no function on the frames to adjust the volume. I think in their new update line they should think about having a charging case. Anddddd I was expecting for a cleaning cloth to be included.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Fine product. Odd charger.
customer_reviews.text: Listening to Thrillington now. A parody of Ram by McCartney by the man himself (so heavy on the bass). The sound was simply excellent. Being old and all; I wish it came with instructions. The product arrived as described. Pristine and new. Hopefully they will provide a series of lenses (clear, magnifiers) for older folks. The charger is very specific to this item. Nothing I have ever seen before. Magnetic connection. Honestly great sound. The charger is weird. No choice on the lenses. Your on your own on figuring how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: KTC

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Has a microphone too so you can talk on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Prisci

customer_reviews.title: Works, Fits & Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: Best gift for the hubby tech lover. Make sure you purchase the correct size since the fit of the glasses do come sizes. It works perfectly, tint on the lenses is good, battery lasts. Overall made amazingly.
customer_reviews.author: Rebexx92

customer_reviews.title: Pretty fun not to have headphones but others can hear
customer_reviews.text: These are fun to wear and use on a phone call. They have a microphone built in so you can just say something like "call jeff" and your phone will do it (as long as you're within 30 feet--bluetooth). They can be a little tight on the head and it is pretty much speakers behind your ears--others can definitely hear it, if you cup your hand over the ear you can hear it even louder. Also, the volume requires a clever adjustment involving holding a button and turning your head which sounds easy but seems to not be.
customer_reviews.author: Animal Friendly

customer_reviews.title: I need a charging cable
customer_reviews.text: This might be my first review everrrr since 2001 and tens of thousands of dollars in purchases. Great product I enjoyed it immensely (just like all my other Bose stuff) but only for a short time as the charging cable was taken from my car and I can't find a replacement ??? Why should it bee so hard ??
customer_reviews.author: Nigel R Pigott

customer_reviews.title: Can’t play my music
customer_reviews.text: Can’t play my music, to pay this much for a Bose product and not be free to use it the way I want is a rip-off
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Poor Bluetooth connectivity to iPhone
customer_reviews.text: The sound was great. However, there was disconnect with the Bluetooth connection to my iPhone located less than a foot from the glasses that occurred about every 2 minutes and I was using the correct Boise app. I was listening to great music that would have an approximately 1 second dead space about every 2 minutes. This happened on a regular basis for the entirety of a 4 mile walk. It totally destroyed the music experience.
customer_reviews.author: Coletta

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Product by Bose
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with my purchase of the Bose Frame glasses. They fit great, the look is super, and they sound much better than I had expected. It's hard to explain, but the music is spot-on, and all the while you can hear what's going on near you. I used them today for nearly 4-hours before they died. I had the volume at a mid to low level so I could talk to folks. They worked great today. My only complaint is that I wish there was a way to purchase a second charging cord. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce G. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in fit and volume.
customer_reviews.text: The glasses themselves don't fit the face very well. I wear a size 7 3/4 hat and these Lg Rondo sunglasses continued to slide down my nose to the position that a senior citizen wear bifocal glasses. I intended to wear them while running. Considering they slid down while grocery shopping and driving, I didn't bother testing while running. Audio quality is ok, there's no bass but what do you expect from miniature speakers in a pair of sunglasses. It was the volume where they failed. The music/audio books had a moderate volume at best. Phone calls had poor volume and the other person couldn't hear me very well. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Bruch72

customer_reviews.title: Not worth money
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great if you sit around in house with sunglasses on these are for you. Can’t use to mow lawn can’t hear music can’t use in garden makes you sweat even more and your not to get wet But sounds great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool Product rendered useless if you lose the proprietary charging cable
customer_reviews.text: Was pretty stoked on these for about a week or two until I left my charging cable in a wall while on vacation. Unfortunately, other similar third party 4 pin magnetic chargers won't fit Bose's port, and replacement parts are out of stock for the foreseeable future. I'm now left with a very expensive pair of sunglasses that can't turn on. Cool idea, but be careful. What could have been a very solvable problem has instead left me with a hunk of dead tech because even though Bose can't supply the part, they sure didn't want anyone else getting that $10 either. Super lame.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Grummon

customer_reviews.title: Great 92% of the time
customer_reviews.text: So they work great! However! They stopped working for no reason a couple months after we got them. Could not replace them through Amazon so we had to work directly with Bose, that process took forever but eventually we got it fixed and corrected. Great product when it's working. Battery could last a little longer too. They aren't used a ton and still die pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with these, they work fine. But my $17 Bluetooth sunglasses work better! So I am returning the Bose pair. They are simply not worth 10X the price.
customer_reviews.author: Salty Dog

customer_reviews.title: This is my 2nd review, after owning these 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: I had Rx lenses installed and bought a set of those eye glasses non slip doo dads from amazon, cuz I live in the SW dessert and we sweat here making any glasses slip. They are doing well, and meet my needs well. If you are trying to get away with music or podcasts at work or without people listening in they are the real deal. No of course they’re not as good as over the ear head phones, but in this arena they are the only choice. Real Rx sunglasses frames cost more than $200 and don’t have the advanced electronics of these.
customer_reviews.author: PatrickPeQueen

customer_reviews.title: product support is a joke
customer_reviews.text: stopped working Asurion said see Bose. Bose is in perpetual lockdown
customer_reviews.author: David johns

customer_reviews.title: Loved These, but.....
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I haven’t had them for very long, but they fill the bill perfectly. I always have had trouble keeping earbuds in my ears. And over-the-ear headphones aren’t always convenient. These serve a dual purpose....sunglasses and listening to music, podcasts, whatever! I’m editing my review. After a year and a half they have simply quit working. They won’t take a charge. I tried going onto Bose’s website...basically useless. However, I love them so much that I’m buying a new pair...the Tempo. I cycle alone a lot, and these are wonderful for that and yet I’m able to hear what is around me.
customer_reviews.author: Panamaniac

customer_reviews.title: Freakin’ Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: These are AWESOME! I use these daily for long walks and biking. The sound quality is great, bass and treble are perfect (I listen to a lot of podcasts and talk radio while out walking/jogging). I recommend these to everybody looking for a quality pair of conventional Bluetooth shades. They’re super practical and way easier than taking around cords and earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Super device - Check your received order, explore 3rd party lenses!!
customer_reviews.text: After a faux pas with my first shipment - bought new and received a clearly used device already paired to previous owner’s phone (“antone’s frame”” with sweat marks on the inside temples & static-filled phone transmit audio - I returned and quickly received a replacement order. Despite this initial experience, once I received an actual new device and felt good about my return which Amazon handled swiftly, the use of my Rondos frames has yielded excellent results. Love wearing these quirky round frames, the audio is fantastic, and with the addition of photo-chromatic lenses it’s been awesome to enjoy.!!
customer_reviews.author: cognetic

customer_reviews.title: No charging case
customer_reviews.text: So far, I really enjoy these sunglass/headphones. They are perfect for my bike rides and hikes. I like that I can still hear what is going on around me during that time and still rock out. So far my only complaint is the case does not charge the glasses. What a missed opportunity. If they are only going to last a couple hours, the case should charge them while I'm having lunch or in a meeting. Also, really? Another cable that doesn't work for anything else?! C'mon. There are still a few features I want to try out but all in all, they are exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi Kurth

customer_reviews.title: Shocking first buy..... amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased this last week for my sons 13th birthday. He was so excited! However, to our shocking dismay, the box was EMPTY!!! No glasses. So I immediately contacted customer service and chatted with Matthew. He was great. Sent another one which i received today. To say the least, my son is thrilled. Sound quality is fantastic and the Bluetooth connected right away with problem. The shades fit his face just right.
customer_reviews.author: O. O. esan

customer_reviews.title: Was Skeptical at First, but these are great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these and was skeptical about the fit, and sound quality. I must say I was surprised about how light they are in wearing. The sound quality is good, although you do have to have volume slightly higher. And, when using for phone calls, people on the other end say it was no different than being on the phone or other earbud type devices. The battery seems to fair well, a trick that have used is while wearing them, I do not turn on unless I want to listen to music. And it is easy to hit the on button to have it connect to take a call.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Great way to be more active during the day!
customer_reviews.text: They are GREAT! Great excuse now to take my dog for a walk. Not only is the sound quality GREAT, but I can also hear for other issues and not be worried I won’t hear a car or pedestrian pass. Sure they may be able to hear what’s playing, but I’m not rude and play them indoors with other people around. Like a plane, train or hospital waiting area. Great for the beach! Walking the dog, riding your bike, etc. great excuse to be more active. Now my dog gets longer walks. Which I’m sure that’s a big score for him.
customer_reviews.author: JackBear79

customer_reviews.title: works easily
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to connect and use. Great for biking or walking. Allows you to hear your surrounding environment.
customer_reviews.author: William P. Lauder

customer_reviews.title: Cool in concept, but not in practice
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to try as I am a Bose fan. I wanted to like them, I really did. It’s a cool concept! But in practice the audio quality suffers in a big way. And I guess that makes sense. But if you want natural sounding music and any measurable amount of bass, these are definitely not for you. Build quality is good, but sound quality really isn’t.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ogden

customer_reviews.title: Good concept
customer_reviews.text: Good concept, just not very practical IMO. Don't use it very often and also its very heavy and thick. As a result, it is always slipping if I get even a little sweaty. If you are going to get a pair of Bose frames I would recommend the other frames just because they don't have nearly as much slippage and the other pair just feels better wearing.
customer_reviews.author: henry

customer_reviews.title: Everyone thinks they are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I am probably causing questions at the pool, people wondering how I am rocking it out with no detectable sound. Meantime, I hear part of the band in one ear, another part in the other ear, and Mick Jagger is right in my brain!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Fits a niche
customer_reviews.text: I generally like the Frames despite the score. They're perfect for wearing on my daily walks and OK when I am running. The Frames' built-in volume controls are pretty poor. I have to control the volume from my iPhone. They also are pretty poor if there's any meaningful noise, such as traffic. I initially ordered S/M, and they were tight, but fit perfectly for a run. I exchanged them for the M/L, which fit much better, but are a bit too lose for a long, sweaty run
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Almost
customer_reviews.text: Good sound and sunglasses but the battery isn’t long enough
customer_reviews.author: Artre Rusk

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound quality, the feel, and the overall look. The frames and lenses seem pretty cheap but I didn’t buy them as just sunglasses I bought them as a personal listening device. I gave them 4 stars because if I’m in a quiet place listening through these glasses other people can hear it if they are turned up even less than half way. The battery lasts several hours actively listening. They hold a charge for a week when not in use which really shocked me.
customer_reviews.author: Joy H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Innvation
customer_reviews.text: I really like these frames. Super sound quality. I can wear it at work w/o disturbing others and at the same time I can hear them so I wouldn't ignore them. Cons : Battery life needs to be improved. You feel little for first couple of days ..It would be great if Bose comes up options of of choosing different lenses while placing the order itself. If I want to wear at office then reading/transitioned lense should be perfect, changing the lense would is pain in the back for customer.
customer_reviews.author: Bhaskar Shanthi

customer_reviews.title: I received a used pair.
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, this is the second pair I have bought now because I was clumsy with the first. The pair I received this time was a used pair. It had issues being paired because it had already been paired with someone else’s phone and the lenses were all smudged. It was missing the cleaning cloth case that come with them and all the plastic packaging that come on them to prevent them getting scratches in transport. I wouldn’t have minded so much if I had chosen to buy a used pair, but paying for a new pair and getting a used pair is not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Clara Gandarilla

customer_reviews.title: Feel like you're living in the future, just not on Android devices
customer_reviews.text: They're heavy, but not uncomfortable. They look just like normal sunglasses. The sound quality is surprisingly good considering these are literally sunglasses. However, Bose AR, arguably the biggest selling point for the frames, has basically no Android support. Bose released an Android developer kit late last year, but they've said very little about the future of Bose AR on Android devices. Until they have more Android functionality, I'd be wary as an Android user. That said, if you just want to listen to music in the sun, they're pretty damn neat.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Bose frames - good product for 3 months after that a lemon
customer_reviews.text: At first it was a great replacement for a hands free, work perfectly in most environments. After three months and out of the blue the frames stoped working, it doesn't turn on and its erratic at charging, when connected to a computer it will update but it doesn't turn on. after this problem i went on line and found that its a common problem and the only way to remedy it is to change the frames. because of this I downgrade the rating from 5 to 1
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Ramos Arango

customer_reviews.title: They are amazing. Like putting earphones on. Not the same, but similar and just amazing.
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing. I would have never purchased anything like this unless it came from Bose. If it comes from Bose you know its gotta work good at the least. When I put them on, I was simply amazed. I have put them on 4 different friends and they are also amazed. They are not a replacement for headphones, you cant hear if you ride a bike real fast, or are walking in really heavy traffic, but thats aboiut it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe J

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic idea and I love them. I wish they were a little louder but for what they do they are great. Don’t get me wrong here, I’m not saying in any way that the sound quality is amazing or even that good for that matter. But, of you want to be able to walk around and hear the sounds outside and still hear your tunes or take a call... there are awesome. In fact... they would have been the absolute best if they included one last thing. These should have clear lenses available so you could work indoors on your computer and still use them. Big miss on that.
customer_reviews.author: Yaniv C.

customer_reviews.title: Love these for outdoor biking, hiking, and walking
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first but ended up getting these for bike rides - they are AWESOME! Regular in-ear headphones can be dangerous and wires are annoying. I use these for walking, hiking, biking, etc. The sound is great (way better than I expected), I can still hear the outside world, and you can't hear them unless they're on your head. They easy to connect, charge pretty fast, and have a good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Mkhaldi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound
customer_reviews.text: Sound Quality is incredible!!! I love how convenient and discreet it is! Microphone sound quality is also amazing. When I call people they can’t tell I’m using a Bluetooth device and not my actual phone. Maximum volume is louder than I expected and you don’t lose sound quality at maximum volume. Volume control from the actual frames doesn’t work however between my Apple Watch and actual iPhone I really don’t need that function. I wish it had a better water resistance rating.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Talcott

customer_reviews.title: The glasses work perfectly,they sycnc with my IOS devices very easily.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these glasses they work perfectly with my ios devices, the sound quality is alright,sounds much better when you cup your hands over your hears. The quality of the frames is great . I dont like that the charging cable is not micro usb. They are expensive but worth it. Anything with THE name BOSE is expensive and quality. I have brought 2 pairs.
customer_reviews.author: KASHAKA

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love love love them. They are lightweight, they are great sunglasses and I just love listening to music, taking phone calls, etc. & the voices for the phone calls are clear. Listening to the music while I’m walking, sometimes I wonder where the music is coming from-there’s nothing in your ears. Can’t say enough good things about it.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Good birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: my son not liking it saying weak bass, short battery life. I may have to return it & get what he wants instead _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ gave it to my son & he's happy with it
customer_reviews.author: NOLBU

customer_reviews.title: Amazing while it still works.
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product regularly since November of 2019. About 2 days from writing this review have noticed that the unit does not charge anymore despite using different USB sources & a new charging BOSE proprietary charging cable.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED !!!
customer_reviews.text: Not EVEN Had a Chance to put my music links ON ! Arms of glasses look spread ! & Then one of them came out !!! SUGGESTIONS ON HOW TO RETURN THESE EXPENSIVE GLASSES ?
customer_reviews.author: Evelyne Lotz

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great!
customer_reviews.text: These frames are awesome. The sound quality is incredible for being open ear, yet you are still able to clearly hear your surroundings. Great for walking, running (if the wind isn't too bad), communtes, etc. Battery life lasts about 4 continuous hours, which is penlty for half marathons and faster marathoners. You can easily get some Rx lenses from glassesUSA as well.
customer_reviews.author: DavieDave

customer_reviews.title: EXPENSIVE WITH CHEAP FRAMES
customer_reviews.text: SOUND CONTROLED BY DEVICE IT IS PAIRED UP WITH... FRAMES SLIP OFF NOSE.. I HAD TO BUY SILCONE STICKERS FOR THE FRAME FROM WALMART TO KEEP GLASSES FROM SLIPPING .. REALY FOR 200 BUCK ? ALSO THE SPECIAL ATTACHMENT FOR THE CHARGING OF THE GLASSES ... DON'T LOOSE THE CHARGING CABLE OR YOUR OUT OF LUCK. OH THERE NOT WEATHER PROOF BEWARE OF THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Blakely

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!  Absolutely Love these Sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh! I absolutely LOVE my Bose Sunglasses! They fit great, the sound is amazing! Everyone who tries my sunglasses just gasp! Thank you Bose!!! ❤️😘. My husband wants pair now.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica F.

customer_reviews.title: A lot of money if they only last 7 months
customer_reviews.text: Like the sound and the glasses, but the on/off button does not work 7 months after purchase Amazon directed me to Bose as they are not standing by the product. Button was problematic from day 1
customer_reviews.author: Snowbird

customer_reviews.title: Bose Frames / Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy there glasses for listening to music when relaxing outside at home or on vacation. Sound is good and can be controlled from iPhone. Doesn't seem to come with instructions for use. Warnings are there etc but bose and instructions for use fail miserably on these glasses ( and on portable speakers too - Revolve & Speaker 500 also).
customer_reviews.author: D. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: It's usable
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty heavier than I expected. And Bose App is glitching a lot and Bluetooth connection is also a bit out of control sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Sorim Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality as expected, over priced
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of this sunglasses with built-in speaker but sadly it does not fit well and the sound quality is far below Bose standard (I got their bluetooth earbuds and bluetooh speaker before it still works good) and it's not comtable at all! Plus the materials look cheap compare to the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: H to the moon

customer_reviews.title: Love the concept!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these glasses on a whim one day just to see how they perform, and ended up loving them so much I got them as a gift for multiple family members and friends! The concept is great, however I feel certain features might need some work for future models but this is a great start.
customer_reviews.author: Mahsa Shekari

customer_reviews.title: They are so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are so comfortable not having something in your ear and the sound is great and nobody around you can hear it. And they are excellent sunglasses also. I have the smoky grey lenses and they work well on the golf course on an overcast day and also in the stores where I could continue to listen to podcasts and music and Rush Limbaugh
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: A driver's dream
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box I was surprised at how easy these are to use. Download the Bose app to your phone and the sync is a snap. The sound quality is Bose at their best and the volume has to be high for it to be heard by others. My only complaint is the lenses aren't the best but you can upgrade and order interchangeable lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Scifimother

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: sorry it took so long to review the item but my husband got it for Christmas and he's starting to use it now and he said he loves it the sound is perfect 👍
customer_reviews.author: Olguita Mejias

customer_reviews.title: Your sun companion
customer_reviews.text: This was a Father’s Day gift for my hubby and I has become his friend for life. Serviceable glasses for sun protection but great work on the audio. Gesture and single button driven controls instantly make you the coolest guy in the block. Will be buying the additional lenses for options. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Revathi Shankaran

customer_reviews.title: The sound is crystal clear!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use this product for phone calls while on-the-go. There is some connectivity issues, but I am not sure it if it is a Bose or and Apple issue. For all other purposes, they are a wonderful pair of headphones to have. When they work, the sound is crystal clear!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Facer

customer_reviews.title: Good but there is some room to improve
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the idea of not having to keep the phone all the time while wearing my sunglasses. This allows me not only to listen to podcasts, but music too. I read in a review that does not work with Spotify. This is not true, it works perfectly. I just missed a bit of bass and the possibility of being able to call any voice assistant like siri and google assistant without having to squeeze the button that is on the right side. These items could be a good improvement for me and I hope Bose can do something with software to include these options.
customer_reviews.author: US Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Classes need prescription lense.
customer_reviews.text: I love them because they allow me to hear music and/or documentaries while riding my bike. Sound great and the ears are open so they can hear things in the environment as needed. The only reason they are given a four stars is the lack of cooperation with lens manufacturers. They need to be able to receive prescription lenses in order to be more useful to me.
customer_reviews.author: BillyBob

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses/ headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know what to expect with audio built in to sunglasses frames but Bose delivered. They have a nice punch and the clarity is great. I wear these while riding my electric bikes. I like the option of pressing the button and turning my head to adjust the volume. Typical Bose product.
customer_reviews.author: Joyful1

customer_reviews.title: I liked them while they worked
customer_reviews.text: I liked them while they worked. It seems they quit charging for no reason after only 3 months of periodic use. I recently threw the box away not thinking I would ever need it.
customer_reviews.author: B Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Software for Apple doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I would wait awhile until BOSE get's the software right. Connecting is impossible with an iPhone. See reviews online at Bose. Crazy procedures to link phone to unusable app. I like to glasses and sound is good - not best. Battery life is a short 3 hours but that is expected with a small device. Had mine for a month now - still no VR capability.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great surprise, glad I bought them
customer_reviews.text: I bought them as a gift for my husband and he loves them! He says they're not heavy and the sound quality is unexpectedly amazing (for sunglasses). I think they are perfect for anyone who likes to be aware of their surroundings and be able to listen to music (or anything else) at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: glad i got them.
customer_reviews.text: I bought rando. i'm an android user. works great, looks great. they are quality sunglasses on their own. Sound quality isn't the best but to not have your ears covered is really nice. great for driving, biking, walking.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, not great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound quality, but too quiet. Frames feel very cheap and plasticy. This is a strange product that seemed a lot better than it is.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Servello

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Buy
customer_reviews.text: These are great, Battery life is good, but strongly suggest that you run the battery out and than charge. Has amazing sound quality, works great for 6-10 mile runs, and keeps battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Giersdorf's

customer_reviews.title: Boss does not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Pricey, but sound great. I wish they also offered a more traditional frame style that would look good with Computer lenses. Definitely sunglasses
customer_reviews.author: Brett | I3dKC, LLC

customer_reviews.title: Great and comfortable to wear. Good for walking.
customer_reviews.text: The audo is clear. Comfortable to wear. I got the Small size and fits pretty well. It's good to use while walking instead of using my Bose 700. You can't compare this to noise cancelling Bose 700 though because 700 has it's purpose. Anyway, worth it to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ray A

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: The sounds is amazing! Just like listening to any other bose speaker, the charge does actually last about 4 hours on a medium setting, and they are very light weight. Now if you are in a room and have the glasses turned up to full blast then your surrounding people will be able to hear enough of the sounds to be a bit annoyed but every Bluetooth sunglasses would be like that, but being outside of full blast everything would be fine. I normally keep mine on about 45-60% volume
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Connect right away. Perfect on runs. Music and phone quality clear, minimal background noise (or so I have been told)... love 'em!

customer_reviews.title: HELLO?????
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no volume at all to these, even putting the volume to the max on my iPhone X does nothing to bring the sound up at all. Nothing special at all about these except I got roped into the “Bose” name and paid over $200 for something that isn’t worth $20. If you told me you bought these at the dollar store, I would believe it
customer_reviews.author: Dominic P. Settemio Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Just got these two days after i order them.... so far so good... great sound... they do slide a little from my nose.. nothing glasses pads couldn't fix....i like then so far.
customer_reviews.author: boris

customer_reviews.title: Not good for taking calls
customer_reviews.text: Have had my Bose stereo system for nearly 20 years and was excited to see this product. I expected something better than what I got. It might be great for listening to music, but if you’re out and about taking calls the sound is not as immersive as the product description would lead you to believe. Could only hear the caller if I was in an extremely quiet setting. Any environmental noise drowned out the callers voice to a whisper. I wouldn’t recommend this if you’re looking for an alternative to an in-ear Bluetooth headset.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Discomfort, poor battery life, not water proof
customer_reviews.text: The glasses have great sound and everyone I show them to are amazed! There are some flaws however. The glasses feel like they fit perfectly, but after wearing them for over 30 mins, the glasses’ arms cause a headache. Aside from that, the battery only lasts 2 hours which is sometimes not even long enough for an outdoor workout. I wish that the glasses were water-proof/resistant so that I can wear them in the pool or if it’s raining. Probably wouldn’t buy another pair if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Goldfuss

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Idea
customer_reviews.text: Great product - perfect for walking on the beach or relaxing in a spa. Excellent sound while those around you can’t hear it. No irritation from ear buds. I added stick on magnifier readers that work great for reading while listening to music.
customer_reviews.author: kelmag

customer_reviews.title: Glass quality was bad
customer_reviews.text: But glass quality was bad while were the glass inside it’s reflecting my face it’s self
customer_reviews.author: Saranya Mathivanan

product_meta.title: Bose 833417-0100 Frames - Audio Sunglasses with Open Ear Headphones, Rondo, Black - with Bluetooth Connectivity,Regular
product_meta.description: Style:Rondo| Pattern Name:SunglassesMeet Bose Frames, the first audio sunglasses from Bose. Miniaturized Bose speakers hidden in the temples produce rich, immersive sound for you, while others hear practically nothing. It's a revolutionary open-ear audio experience that leaves you free to hear the world around you, all while discreetly listening to music. Choose from two timeless styles enriched with premium accents and materials, like gold-plated hinges. Alto offers a classic angular look in a larger size, while Rondo is more distinct with rounded lenses and a smaller fit. Bose Frames include a seamlessly integrated microphone for taking calls and accessing your phone's virtual assistant. They block up to 99% of UVA/UVB rays. And they're easy to use. Bluetooth connectivity provides hassle-free pairing. Plus, the Bose Connect app gives you the ability to personalize settings, access future updates, and more. Every pair of Bose Frames is Bose AR enabled and ready to utilize the new technology when it's available. Bose AR is an innovative audio-only take on augmented reality that uses sound instead of sight to relay information about your world. 832029-0010B, 838211-0010A. Battery Life: 3.5 hours streaming; 12 hours on standby. Charge Time: 2 hours Bluetooth Range: 30 ft. or 9 m Compatible Operating Systems: iOS: 9.0 or newer/ Android: 5.0 or newer.
feature_bullets: Sunglasses with built-in Bose speakers that produce rich, immersive sound for you, while others hear practically nothing. The apps that work with bose frames are Spotify,Apple music,Skype and WhatsApp, Google Maps or Waze
Open-ear audio allows you to stay aware of your surroundings, while enjoying your music
Bose Frames Rondo feature rounded lenses for a distinct look. Lens Width: 51 mm | Bridge Width: 22 mm | Temple Length: 135 mm
Integrated microphone for clear calls and access to your phone’s virtual assistant
Personalized settings, access to future updates, and more available through the Bose Connect app. Bluetooth connectivity for easy pairing
Blocks up to 99% of UVA/UVB rays
Battery Life: 3.5 hours streaming; 12 hours on standby. Charge Time: 2 hours
Compatible Operating Systems: iOS: 9.0 or newer/ Android: 5.0 or newer

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,342 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
